scripts.prepare:rinkeby: mustache config/rinkeby.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/rinkeby.json src/lending-pool.templete.ts > src/lending-pool.ts
scripts.prepare:kovan: mustache config/kovan.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/kovan.json src/lending-pool.templete.ts > src/lending-pool.ts
scripts.prepare:goerli: mustache config/goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/goerli.json src/lending-pool.templete.ts > src/lending-pool.ts
